title: Graphic communication
creator_credit: Alexander Milsky and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: A series of basic geometric shapes are used to illustrates how signs, symbols and diagrams can be employed to represent written or verbal information. Quite complex concepts can often be conveyed effectively by the use of simple symbols.
